mapper.select: SELECT t.title, t.talent_id talentId, t.price FROM Talent t LEFT JOIN Member m ON t.member_id = m.member_id GROUP BY t.talent_id ORDER BY t.talent_id DESC

SELECT t.title, t.content, t.price, t.expired, t.topic, t.latitude, t.longitude, t.map_level mapLevel, t.address, m.nickname FROM Talent t LEFT JOIN Member m ON t.member_id = m.member_id WHERE talent_id = #{talentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Talent(member_id, title, content, price, expired, topic, latitude, longitude, map_level, address) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{price}, #{expired}, #{topic}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{mapLevel}, #{address})
